scripts.scss:watch: npm run scss:build-dev && npm run scss:build-dev -- -w
scripts.build:clean: npm run scss:clean && npm run hugo:clean && npm run js:clean
scripts.build:staging: npm run build:clean && npm run scss:build && npm run js:build && npm run hugo:build:staging && npm run build:beautify
scripts.build:production: npm run build:clean && npm run scss:build && npm run js:build && npm run hugo:build:production && npm run build:beautify
scripts.dev:drafts: concurrently --kill-others "npm run scss:watch" "npm run hugo:serve -- -D" "npm run js:watch"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill others "npm run scss:watch" "npm run hugo:serve" "npm run js:watch"
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.content:update: git submodule update --remote --rebase && git add ./content && git commit -m"Update content submodule"
